Windlord::


"That sounds awful..."commented Windlord after Rattrap's transmision





--- In nbwrpg@y..., Tankor <lordofdarkness11001@y...> wrote:
> 
> rattrap opens a comm to all the maximals "fellow  maximals the 
preds have got four new members and two of them are obsidian and 
strika. so looks like the breds got two new great soldiers.Rattrap 
out"
>  Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:In the Maximal base, Blackfang 
was reviewing the report on the 
> intervention he had to go through. With such heavy damages to 
> essential circuits, he started wondering how he managed not to hurt 
> anyone.
> 
> At the same moment, he saw Ragnar's towering form enter the lounge 
he 
> was in.
> 
> Ragnar: So, guys, this is the lounge, from what I make of the map. 
> Your personnal quarters are on the right.
> 
> Blackfang: There is also an energon distributor at the end of the 
left 
> hallway.
> 
> Ragnar turned at Blackfang and studied him. He was an ugly looking 
> bot, but he also had a sense of nobility emanating from him. He 
> reminded him a bit of Trent, the Smoke Jaguar Mechwarrior who 
betrayed 
> his Clan because of his convictions.
> 
> Ragnar: You are Blackfang, quiaff?
> 
> Blackfang: Yeah, that's me. Ragnar, right? And who are your friends?
> 
> Ragnar: This is Windlord and Aerotaur. They are new warriors here. 
(He 
> stopped a moment) Perhaps you can help me. I have been here only 
for a 
> short time, and since I am not of Robotic origins, I know not what 
we 
> fight for. Maybe you can brief me, quiaff?
> 
> Blackfang grinned: Why not? Alright, we are maximals. Our main 
enemies 
> here are the Predacons, who're some kind of criminals here. Their 
boss 
> has a notoriety for dangerous scheming. However, there are some 
other 
> groups that just popped up since we came here. We may have to deal 
> with'em too.
> 
> Ragnar: I thank you, Blackfang.
>
